result.execSummary:
The defendant Eusebio Rivas Salgado was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operate w/o Valid License(3rd+ w/in3Yrs), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.05(3)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Costs to be paid directly to the Waushara County Clerk of Court within 60 days or establish a payment plan.  Failure to pay may result in suspension of your driver's license, tax intercept, a civil judgment being entered against you, a warrant being issued for your arrest for contempt and/or the debt being turned over to a collection agency.
Huber Privileges and Good Time Credit granted.
DNA sample to be provided and surcharge assessed.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Eusebio Rivas Salgado

Case Called @ 4:07 PM: Defendant Eusebio Rivas Salgado in court with attorney Ryan Scott Ulrich.  Scott C. Blader appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Enrique Soria present as Interpreter.  Oath administered at previous hearing today.  In light of appearance, Court withdraws the warrant.  Resolution recited by the State - State will argue for deviation on the guidelines.  Def and counsel concur with State's recital.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and expertise.  Voluntary waiver of counsel accepted by Court.  Defendant advised of minimum/maximum penalty.  Plea colloquy entertained.  Collateral consequences explained. Chapter 950 compliance addressed. Plea No DL 3:  GP  Court accepts plea and enters JOC.  Argument by DA - argues or 5 days WCJ w/Costs.  Argument by Atty Ulrich - argues for $50 fine plus costs with no Co Jail being imposed.  Statement by Def:  None offered.  The Court:  Will follow State's recommendation - imposes 5 days WCJ, GT and Huber, No TS Credit, Report: 12/1/15 at 8:00 PM - Court Costs plus DNA Surcharge. Sample to be provided today at the WCJ.  Hispanic Appeal Rights Given.
Voluntary appearance at 11-03-2015 04:00 pm
from Atty Ulrich requesting a voluntary appearance - the Court will authorize a voluntary appearance - the warrant will remain active until the hearing.

Case Called @ 3:24 PM: Defendant Eusebio Rivas Salgado in court.  Steven Paul Anderson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Enrique Soria present as Interpreter.  Oath administered at previous hearing today.  Complaint Stated - Advised of offense and minimum/maximum penalty.  Receipt Admitted - Reading Waived.  Advised of right of Counsel.  Def wants counsel  states he will retain his own counsel.  Court will proceed with that understanding.  NGP entered by Court.   STC Scheduled - NOH Given.  Court enters Riverside Ruling in favor of the State and probable cause finding as to each count alleged within the complaint.  Status conference scheduled for June 30, 2015 at 02:45 pm.
